query:
SELECT
                i.inventory_id,
                ing.name as ingredient_name,
                i.quantity,
                i.unit_id,
                i.confidence_level,
                i.location_id,
                i.expiration_date,
                i.updated_at
            FROM inventory i
            JOIN ingredients ing ON i.ingredient_id = ing.ingredient_id
            WHERE ($1::text[] IS NULL OR LOWER(ing.name) = ANY(
                SELECT LOWER(unnest($1::text[]))
            ))
            ORDER BY ing.name
